name: Don't Fall into the Water (Askal Games)
name_original: Don't Fall into the Water (Askal Games)
description:
Gameplay

One day, you're resting and soaking up the sun, not a care in the world. Next thing you know, the tide started rising, carrying you and the platform you're on to the edge of the cliff! Jump onto the next platform, and to the next, to avoid falling into the water.

Controls

Hold and release the left mouse button to jump. The longer you hold on the button, the longer you jump.
